display_name: Stanford sleepiness scale before type I polysomnography
description: This question refers to how sleepy or alert you feel at a particular time. We would like you to read the scale below and then rate how sleepy you feel right now. The scale ranges from 1 to 7, with 7 being the most sleepy. Please read the entire scale, and then check the level that best describes your current state of sleepiness.
